reviews.name: SOG Vulcan Tanto Mini VL-04
reviews.reviewText: I've had this knife for several years now and it has been a great, reliable tool to have. The mechanics of knife are very slick and it makes handling the knife a breeze
reviews.title: Sharp, durable knife

reviews.name: SOG Vulcan Tanto Mini VL-04
reviews.reviewText: I have had this knife for over a year and it is my constant companion. Small enough to fit comfortably in my pocket, lightening fast one hand deployment, easy one hand closure, rugged and completely reliable. I have looked at lots of other folders, but for my money this has them all beat.
reviews.title: Great Knife

reviews.name: SOG Vulcan Tanto Mini VL-04
reviews.reviewText: Opens/closes smoother than butter. The arc-lock is undeniably one of the best locking systems available on any knife. The unique re-curved tanto blade is awesome for virtually any cutting, slicing & stabbing. This is perfect for EDC or tactical or both. By far one of my favorite "do it all" knives in my collection and a must have for yours.
reviews.title: The "F-16" of pocket knives.

reviews.name: SOG Vulcan Tanto Mini VL-04
reviews.reviewText: Picked up a mini Vulcan a month ago and regret it. I wanted the regular sized Vulcan but they're out of stock, like the other three or four I want to purchase. Now that I have it I've learned a $130 lesson, don't buy the mini. It doesn't fit my hand worth a darn. Guess I have a nice, small letter opener for the Mrs.
reviews.title: Mini Vulcan
